Typedef Documentation

◆ cy_timer_callback_t

typedef void(* cy_timer_callback_t) (cy_timer_callback_arg_t arg)

The callback function to be called by a timer

Enumeration Type Documentation

◆ cy_timer_trigger_type_t

enum cy_timer_trigger_type_t

The type of timer

Enumerator
CY_TIMER_TYPE_PERIODIC 

called periodically until stopped

CY_TIMER_TYPE_ONCE 

called once only

cy_timer_type_periodic 
Deprecated:
replaced by CY_TIMER_TYPE_PERIODIC
cy_timer_type_once 
Deprecated:
replaced by CY_TIMER_TYPE_ONCE

Function Documentation

◆ cy_rtos_init_timer()

cy_rslt_t cy_rtos_init_timer ( cy_timer_t *  timer,
cy_timer_trigger_type_t  type,
cy_timer_callback_t  fun,
cy_timer_callback_arg_t  arg 
)

Create a new timer.

This function intializes a timer object.

Note
The timer is not active until start is called.
Parameters
[out]timerPointer to the timer handle to initalize
[in]typeType of timer (periodic or once)
[in]funThe functiuon
[in]argArgument to pass along to the callback function
Returns
The status of the creation request. [CY_RSLT_SUCCESS, CY_RTOS_GENERAL_ERROR]

◆ cy_rtos_start_timer()

cy_rslt_t cy_rtos_start_timer ( cy_timer_t *  timer,
cy_time_t  num_ms 
)

Start a timer.

Note
The callback may be (likely will be) called from a different thread.
Parameters
[in]timerPointer to the timer handle
[in]num_msThe number of miliseconds to wait before the timer fires
Returns
The status of the creation request. [CY_RSLT_SUCCESS, CY_RTOS_GENERAL_ERROR]

◆ cy_rtos_stop_timer()

cy_rslt_t cy_rtos_stop_timer ( cy_timer_t *  timer)

Stop a timer.

Parameters
[in]timerPointer to the timer handle
Returns
The status of the creation request. [CY_RSLT_SUCCESS, CY_RTOS_GENERAL_ERROR]

◆ cy_rtos_is_running_timer()

cy_rslt_t cy_rtos_is_running_timer ( cy_timer_t *  timer,
bool *  state 
)

Returns state of a timer.

Parameters
[in]timerPointer to the timer handle
[out]stateReturn value for state, true if running, false otherwise
Returns
The status of the creation request. [CY_RSLT_SUCCESS, CY_RTOS_GENERAL_ERROR]

◆ cy_rtos_deinit_timer()

cy_rslt_t cy_rtos_deinit_timer ( cy_timer_t *  timer)

Deinit the timer.

This function de initializes the timer and frees all consumed resources.

Parameters
[in]timerPointer to the timer handle
Returns
The status of the creation request. [CY_RSLT_SUCCESS, CY_RTOS_GENERAL_ERROR]
